description: Antium ranked as one of the most important and most powerful centers of Latium and was captured by Rome at the close of the Latin War in the fourth century B.C. Imperial Antium was well known for its number of coastal villas.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Anzio. According to Tacitus (Ann. 15.39), this was the location where Nero was during the Great Fire of Rome (64 AD).
